00038   //------------------------------------------------ Quaternion::SetEuler
00039   const Quaternion& Quaternion::SetAxisAngle( const Real& angle, const Real& _x, const Real& _y, const Real& _z )
00040   {
00041     chain::Real _angle = angle * 0.5;
00042     chain::Real sin_a = CH_SIN(_angle);
00043     chain::Real cos_a = CH_COS(_angle);
00044     //sin_a = 1/sin_a;
00045 
00046     x = _x * sin_a;
00047     y = _y * sin_a;
00048     z = _z * sin_a;
00049     w = cos_a;
00050 
00051     return *this;
00052   }

00060     Real xy = x * y;
00061     Real xz = x * z;

00064     Real yz = y * z;
00065     Real yw = y * w;
00066     Real zz = z * z;
00067     Real zw = z * w;

00071       (1-2*(yy+zz),  2*(xy-zw),  2*(xz+yw), 0,

00084   //------------------------------------------------ Quaternion::ToAxisAngles
00085   void Quaternion::ToAxisAngles( Real& angle, Real& _x, Real& _y, Real& _z ) const
00086   {
00087     Quaternion quat (Normalised());
00088     angle = CH_ACOS(quat.w)*2;
00089     Real sina = CH_SQRT(1.0 - quat.w*quat.w);
00090     if (fabs(sina) < 0.0005)
00091     {
00092       // sina = 1;
00093       _x = quat.x;
00094       _y = quat.y;
00095       _z = quat.z;
00096     }
00097     else
00098     {
00099       sina = 1/sina;
00100       _x = quat.x * sina;
00101       _y = quat.y * sina;
00102       _z = quat.z * sina;
00103     }
00104   }

00117   //------------------------------------------------ Quaternion::GetAngle
00118   chain::Real Quaternion::GetAngle()
00119   {
00120     return CH_ACOS(w)*2;
00121   }

00123   //----------------------------------------------------------- Quaternion::Split
00124   void Quaternion::Split (Quaternion& _x, Quaternion& _y, Quaternion& _z) const
00125   {
00126     EulerAngle ea (*this);
00127 
00128     if(ea.x!=0)
00129       _x.SetAxisAngle(ea.x,1,0,0);
00130     else
00131       _x.Set();
00132 
00133     if(ea.y!=0)
00134       _y.SetAxisAngle(ea.y,0,1,0);
00135     else
00136       _y.Set();
00137 
00138     if(ea.z!=0)
00139       _z.SetAxisAngle(ea.z,0,0,1);
00140     else
00141       _z.Set();
00142 
00143 #if 0
00144     chain::Real ex,ey,ez;
00145     ToEulerAngles(ex,ey,ez);
00146 
00147     if(ex!=0)
00148       _x.SetAxisAngle(ex,1,0,0);
00149     else
00150       _x.Set();
00151

00153       _y.SetAxisAngle(ey,0,1,0);
00154     else
00155       _y.Set();
00156 
00157     if(ez!=0)
00158       _z.SetAxisAngle(ez,0,0,1);
00159     else
00160       _z.Set();
00161 #endif // 0

00180   {

00184   //----------------------------------------------------------- Quaternion::GetRollAngle
00185   Real Quaternion::GetRollAngle () const
00186   {
00187     // atan2 expands atan from range -pi/2 < x < pi/2, to the full -pi < x < pi
00188     // atan2 uses sign of A and B of atan(A/B) to determin the correct
00189     Real a;
00190     Real test = w*y - z*x;
00191     if (test > 0.4999)
00192       a = 2 * CH_ATAN2(x,w);
00193     else if (test < -0.4999)
00194       a = -2 * CH_ATAN2(x,w);
00195     else
00196       a = CH_ATAN2((2*(w*x + y*z)) , (1 - 2*(x*x + y*y)));
00197     //Real a = CH_ATAN2(2*(q1.x*q1.w-y*z) , 1 - 2*sqx - 2*sqz);
00198     return a;
00199   }
00200 
00201   //----------------------------------------------------------- Quaternion::GetPitchAngle
00202   Real Quaternion::GetPitchAngle () const
00203   {
00204     Real a;
00205     Real test = w*y - z*x;
00206     if (test > 0.4999)
00207       a = PI*0.5;
00208     else if (test < -0.4999)
00209       a = -PI*0.5;
00210     else
00211       a = CH_ASIN(2*test);
00212 
00213     return a;
00214   }
00215 
00216   //----------------------------------------------------------- Quaternion::GetYawAngle
00217   Real Quaternion::GetYawAngle () const
00218   {
00219     // atan2 expands atan from range -pi/2 < x < pi/2, to the full -pi < x < pi
00220     // atan2 uses sign of A and B of atan(A/B) to determin the correct
00221 
00222     Real a;
00223     Real test = w*y - z*x;
00224     if (test > 0.4999 || test < -0.4999)
00225       a = 0;
00226     else
00227       a = CH_ATAN2((2*(w*z + x*y)) , (1 - 2*(y*y + z*z)));
00228     //Real a = CH_ATAN2(2*(y*w - x*z) , 1 - 2*(y*y - z*z));
00229     return a;
00230   }
00231 #endif // 0

00233   //----------------------------------------------------------- Quaternion::Normalise
00234   const Quaternion& Quaternion::Normalise()
00235   {
00236     double tmp = x*x + y*y + z*z + w*w;
00237     if(tmp>0.0)
00238     {
00239       tmp = 1.0 / sqrt(tmp);
00240       x *= (Real)tmp;
00241       y *= (Real)tmp;
00242       z *= (Real)tmp;
00243       w *= (Real)tmp;
00244     }
00245     return *this;
00246   }
00247 
00248   //----------------------------------------------------------- Quaternion::Normalised
00249   chain::Quaternion Quaternion::Normalised() const
00250   {
00251     double tmp = x*x + y*y + z*z + w*w;
00252     if(tmp!=0.0)
00253       tmp = 1.0 / sqrt(tmp);
00254     return Quaternion (x*(Real)tmp,y*(Real)tmp,z*(Real)tmp,w*(Real)tmp);
00255   }

00258   const Quaternion& Quaternion::ScaleTo( Real s )
00259   {
00260     return (*this = SLERP( Quaternion(), *this, s/GetAngle() ));
00261   }

00269   //----------------------------------------------------------- Quaternion::Mag
00270   chain::Real Quaternion::Magnitude() const
00271   {
00272     return CH_SQRT(x*x+y*y+z*z+w*w);

00287   //----------------------------------------------------------- Quaternion::operator*
00288   chain::Quaternion Quaternion::operator*( const Quaternion& q ) const
00289   {
00290     return Quaternion( q.w*x + q.x*w + y*q.z - z*q.y,
00291       q.w*y + q.y*w + z*q.x - x*q.z,
00292       q.w*z + q.z*w + x*q.y - y*q.x,
00293       q.w*w - q.x*x - q.y*y - q.z*z );
00294   }

00331   bool Quaternion::operator==( const Quaternion& q ) const
00332   {
00333     return FCOMPARE(x,q.x) && FCOMPARE(y,q.y) && FCOMPARE(z,q.z) && FCOMPARE(w,q.w);
00334   }

00336   //----------------------------------------------------------- Quaternion::operator!=
00337   bool Quaternion::operator!=( const Quaternion& q ) const
00338   {
00339     if( !FCOMPARE(x,q.x) || !FCOMPARE(y,q.y) || !FCOMPARE(z,q.z) || !FCOMPARE(w,q.w) )
00340       return true;
00341     return false;
00342   }

00344   Quaternion SLERP (const Quaternion& q1, const Quaternion& q2, const Real& t)
00345   {
00346     Quaternion Q2;
00347     Quaternion rtrn;
00348 
00349     if( FCOMPARE( q1.x, q2.x ) &&
00350         FCOMPARE( q1.y, q2.y ) &&
00351         FCOMPARE( q1.z, q2.z ) &&
00352         FCOMPARE( q1.w, q2.w ) )
00353       return q1;
00354 
00355     // dot product
00356     Real prod = q1.x*q2.x +
00357                 q1.y*q2.y +
00358                 q1.z*q2.z +
00359                 q1.w*q2.w;
00360 
00361     if (prod < 0.001f)
00362     { // if greater than 90, q2 and prod are negative
00363       Q2.Set(-q2.x,-q2.y,-q2.z,-q2.w);
00364       prod = -prod;
00365     }
00366     else
00367       Q2 = q2;
00368 
00369     Real iterp = t;
00370     Real iterp_inv = 1.0f - t;
00371 
00372     // Clamp to the range of acos
00373     if (prod > 1)
00374       prod = 0.999999f;
00375     else if (prod < -1)
00376       prod = -0.999999f;
00377 
00378     Real theta = CH_ACOS(prod);
00379     Real sinTheta = CH_SIN(theta);
00380 
00381     if (sinTheta != 0.0f)
00382     {
00383       iterp_inv = CH_SIN(iterp_inv * theta) / sinTheta;
00384       iterp = CH_SIN(iterp * theta) / sinTheta;
00385     }
00386 
00387     rtrn.x = (iterp_inv * q1.x) + (iterp * Q2.x);
00388     rtrn.y = (iterp_inv * q1.y) + (iterp * Q2.y);
00389     rtrn.z = (iterp_inv * q1.z) + (iterp * Q2.z);
00390     rtrn.w = (iterp_inv * q1.w) + (iterp * Q2.w);
00391 
00392     return rtrn.Normalise();
00393   }
00394 
00395   //----------------------------------------------------------- DIFF
00396   Quaternion DIFF( const Quaternion& orig, const Quaternion& dest )
00397   {
00399     Quaternion ret = dest * -orig;
00400     return ret;
00401   }
